title: Iran’s tax authority wants to legalize crypto exchanges

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.subtitle: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

subtitle_detail.value: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

summary: The Iranian tax agency has called for establishing a legal framework for crypto trading platforms so they can be taxed properly.
